svg.class: inline-block shrink-0 -translate-y-1/2 absolute top-1/2 right-4 size-3 text-co-primary/60 transition-transform duration-200 group-hover/btn:translate-x-0.5 group-hover/btn:text-co-primary
svg.style: transition: none !important; animation-duration: 0s !important; animation-delay: -0.0001s; animation-play-state: paused; fill: none; height: 12px; transition-property: none; visibility: visible; width: 12px

title.style: transition: none !important; animation-duration: 0s !important; animation-delay: -0.0001s; animation-play-state: paused; fill: none; transform-origin: 0px 0px; transition-property: none; visibility: visible

svg.title: arrow-right

path.style: transition: none !important; animation-duration: 0s !important; animation-delay: -0.0001s; animation-play-state: paused; fill: none; stroke: oklab(0.145 -0.00000143796 0.00000340492 / 0.6); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2px; transform-origin: 0px 0px; transition-property: none; visibility: visible
